Beast Stalker’s Target.name: Beast Stalker’s Target
Beast Stalker’s Target.effect: The target is designated as your quarry until the end of the encounter, and you can designate one additional creature as a quarry following the normal Hunter’s Quarry rules.

Pinpointing Arrow.name: Pinpointing Arrow
Pinpointing Arrow.flavor: Your shot is undeterred by obstructions and magical veils.
Pinpointing Arrow.target: One creature designated as your quarry
Pinpointing Arrow.special: Ignore penalties for cover (but not superior cover), concealment, and total concealment. You can attack an invisible target as if it wasn’t invisible.

Hunter’s Grace.name: Hunter’s Grace
Hunter’s Grace.flavor: Even as your allies take stock of the enemies pouring in around them, you move into position and set your plans into motion.
Hunter’s Grace.effect: Make a Stealth check and use that as your initiative check result. If you get the first turn in the encounter, you can shift up to your speed as a free action before taking any other actions.
